definition: five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence/cf four horsemen of the apocalypse

sentences.english: " Five emperors" of the temple refers to five gods of plague.
sentences.chinese: 本庙“五帝”是指五位瘟神。

sentences.english: They are human beings, not a scourge and the god of plague.
sentences.chinese: 他们也是人，并非洪水猛兽和瘟神。

sentences.english: The hands, however, made no such allowances or excuses as these for misery and rushton .
sentences.chinese: 可是工人们仍然不能宽恕体谅瘟神和拉什顿。

sentences.english: He tries to avoid me like the plague.
sentences.chinese: 他总是回避我，好像我是瘟神一样。

sentences.english: That time is not aware of AIDS, I feel like with the god of plague.
sentences.chinese: 那时间对艾滋病一点也不知道，就觉得跟瘟神一样。

definition: comet or supernova viewed as evil portent
lit. the soul of a deceased has not yet dispersed (idiom)/fig. the influence still lingers on/the spirit (of some doctrine) is still alive
bearer of ill luck/person with the evil eye/comet
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
can't afford to offend/dare not provoke/difficult to deal with/insufferable
same as 閻羅王|阎罗王/Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
